message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $250?
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand that $250 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can do $220, and that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to take it?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $200?

I'm getting a bit concerned that we're not meeting in the middle after all. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can do $210, and that's as low as I can go. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $190?

I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle after all. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can do $200, but that's as low as I can go. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit above. Would you be willing to meet me at $195?

I've made a lot of concessions already, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $200. I'm starting to think that's the best I can do. I'm willing to meet you at $200, but that's as low as I can go. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $200, but I've already decided to walk away if I can't get it for $120. I'm afraid I'll have to pass on the deal at $200.
